pre_command: defaults write com.apple.Notes windowStateArchive -dict-add currentNoteContainerViewMode 0 && osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to make new note with properties {name:"Lorem Ipsum", body:"Dolor Sit Amet"}' && osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to delete every note' -e 'tell application "Notes" to delete every note in folder "Recently Deleted"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to quit'
grading_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' | grep -A20 "192.168.0.1" | grep -A20 "192.168.1.1" | grep -A20 "192.168.123.234" | grep -A20 "192.168.255.239" | grep -A20 "192.168.10.5" >/dev/null && echo "True" || echo "False"

[ $(osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' | grep -Eo "<li>(192.168.0.1|192.168.1.1|192.168.123.234|192.168.255.239|192.168.10.5)" | sort -u | wc -l) -ge 5 ] && echo "True" || echo "False"

[ $(osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' | grep -Eo "<li>(192.168.0.1|192.168.1.1|192.168.123.234|192.168.255.239|192.168.10.5)" | sort -u | wc -l) -ge 4 ] && echo "True" || echo "False"

[ $(osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' | grep -Eo "<li>(192.168.0.1|192.168.1.1|192.168.123.234|192.168.255.239|192.168.10.5)" | sort -u | wc -l) -ge 3 ] && echo "True" || echo "False"

[ $(osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' | grep -Eo "<li>(192.168.0.1|192.168.1.1|192.168.123.234|192.168.255.239|192.168.10.5)" | sort -u | wc -l) -ge 2 ] && echo "True" || echo "False"

[ $(osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' | grep -Eo "(192.168.0.1|192.168.1.1|192.168.123.234|192.168.255.239|192.168.10.5)" | sort -u | wc -l) -ge 5 ] && echo "True" || echo "False"

[ $(osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' | grep -Eo "(192.168.0.1|192.168.1.1|192.168.123.234|192.168.255.239|192.168.10.5)" | sort -u | wc -l) -ge 4 ] && echo "True" || echo "False"

[ $(osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' | grep -Eo "(192.168.0.1|192.168.1.1|192.168.123.234|192.168.255.239|192.168.10.5)" | sort -u | wc -l) -ge 3 ] && echo "True" || echo "False"
